moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Comet Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Mach Punch
moves.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

moves.name: Bullet Punch
moves.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Vacuum Wave
moves.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Sky Uppercut
moves.description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.
